Page12.Left: I find myself troubled by my dreams of late. They began rather ordinarily, and while I remembered being unsettled by them upon my waking, they came to me weeks apart and with time, whatever fears I had faded. For months it went on like that. However, about two weeks ago, the dreams changed. Not only had they become more frequent, coming to me on a nearly nightly basis, but they began to get longer and more vivid. At times I feel dread falling asleep for I know the nightmares that await will be horrible indeed. That is why I am writing this journal. I hope that by transcribing the contents of these dreams, I may grow to understand them, and perhaps it is through understanding them I might find peace. I shall begin by writing what I recall of my dream last night.
